abstract: GE Capital is taking on the doubters, Breakingviews says. On Tuesday, General Electric’s finance arm addressed investors skeptical of its fit within the sprawling industrial conglomerate.
snippet: GE Capital is taking on the doubters, Breakingviews says. On Tuesday, General Electric’s finance arm addressed investors skeptical of its fit within the sprawling industrial conglomerate.
lead_paragraph: GE Capital is taking on the doubters. On Tuesday, General Electric’s finance arm addressed investors skeptical of its fit within the sprawling industrial conglomerate. Chief among its messages: The business is adequately funded, it has enough capital to handle potential loan losses and it is above average in what it does relative to big American banks.

headline.main: Why Does GE Capital Need a Break?
